app_descript:
Brief: Pixup is an advanced photo editing app designed for both amateur and professional photographers. It offers a broad selection of editing tools that go beyond the essentials to include powerful features like blurring, color balancing, and noise removal. With more than 100 professional effects and a library of creative resources, Pixup makes it simple to transform photos into stunning works of art.
